body: This isn’t even mind break, I don’t give a shit about the post break part if we don’t see the moment when she actually breaks, this sucks. Just plain vanilla NTR, no mind break here.
If she just wants to have sex with her senior, just break up with the boyfriend.

There isn't much changes on this version, in fact content-wise, nothing's changed. Few things that are different: some pages were resized, some japanese texts on the side were resized (page 2) or removed (page 3). Gawd, I love this art, aight I'm out or I'm gonna start rubbing one again.
